content: Hi. We are trying to automatically convert HealthcareService resources from R2 to R3 using the mappings provided by the FHIR specification. The mapping specifies that HealthcareService.serviceType.type from R2 is converted to HealthcareService.type in R3, however at a closer look at the FHIR Release 3 and the associated value sets, the HealthcareService.specialty from R3 is the equivalent of HealthcareService.serviceType.type from R2, and HealthcareService.type in R3 has a different meaning. Is this true, or is it just an error on the webpage?
that'll be an error in the conversion script
can you create a task to fix it please
